thread.title: LeEco Le2 with 3GB RAM and 64GB storage now available online on Snapdeal, priced at Rs 13,999
thread.title_full: LeEco Le2 with 3GB RAM and 64GB storage now available online on Snapdeal, priced at Rs 13,999

title: LeEco Le2 with 3GB RAM and 64GB storage now available online on Snapdeal, priced at Rs 13,999
text:
LeEco Le2 with 3GB RAM and 64GB storage now available online on... LeEco Le2 with 3GB RAM and 64GB storage now available online on Snapdeal, priced at Rs 13,999 By January 2, 2017 “The Le2’s higher storage variant was earlier only available via offline channels” 
Last June, LeEco launched the metal-clad Le2 in India in 3GB / 32GB and 3GB / 64GB variants. Ever since the launch, the former has been available in the country on Flipkart and LeMall, while the latter was only being sold via offline channels. Now, the company has made the higher-specced 3GB / 64GB model of the LeEco Le2 available online. 
The beefed up variant of the LeEco Le2 ( review ) is available online exclusively on Snapdeal for Rs 13,999. This variant comes in a single Rose Gold hue. The e-tailer is also offering an instant discount of five percent on purchases made via all debit and credit cards. 
Apart from the higher storage capacity, the new LeEco Le2 variant offers the same specs as the 3GB RAM model. To recap, the phone offers a metal unibody-design with narrow bezels. It comes with a 5.5-inch FHD display, a 1.8GHz octa-core Snapdragon 652 SoC, 3GB of RAM, 16MP/8MP cameras, a USB Type-C port, VoLTE, Dolby ATMOS-powered speakers, Android Marshmallow, and a 3,000mAh battery.
